name: Public Speaking
description: Deliver powerful presentations and speak with confidence.

levels.title: Overcoming Fear
levels.description: Learn breathing techniques and basics of voice projection. Start small.
practices: Record yourself speaking for 1 minute and listen
Speak up in a meeting at least once

levels.title: Structuring Your Message
levels.description: Learn storytelling structures and how to design effective slides.
practices: Create an outline for a 5-minute talk
Practice telling a personal story with a clear point
Simplify a complex idea for a non-expert

levels.title: Engaging the Audience
levels.objective: Connect with listeners and handle Q&A.
levels.description: Master body language, eye contact, and audience interaction.
practices: Give a presentation to a group (friends or colleagues)
Handle a Q&A session after a talk

resources.title: TED Talks: The Official TED Guide to Public Speaking
